explains: v. 喷发；爆发，突然发生；（感情）迸发；（斑疹等）突然冒出；长牙

sentences.en: Ash began to erupt from the crater.
sentences.cn: 火山灰开始从火山口喷出。

sentences.en: He avers that chaos will erupt if he loses.
sentences.cn: 他断言如果他失败将会爆发动乱。

sentences.en: It does erupt frequently, but those eruptions are usually minor.
sentences.cn: 它的确频繁喷发，但这些爆发通常都是小规模的。
